name: PKPassLibraryNotificationName
desc: The types of notifications that the pass library posts.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a pass library notification name according to the provided raw value.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a pass library notification name according to the provided string.

items.name: static let PKPassLibraryDidChange: PKPassLibraryNotificationName
items.desc: A notification that PassKit posts when the pass library changes.

items.name: static let PKPassLibraryRemotePaymentPassesDidChange: PKPassLibraryNotificationName
items.desc: A notification that PassKit posts when it adds or removes a pass on a paired remote device.
